title: Federer-Nadal Rivalry Ends in a Doubles Match Partnership
description: One of the greatest rivalries in tennis history will end in harmony on Friday when Roger Federer plays his final competitive match with Rafael Nadal as his doubles partner.
dc:creator: Christopher Clarey
media:credit: Glyn Kirk/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer at a practice for the Laver Cup on Thursday in London. They played each other 40 times during their careers, with Nadal winning 24 of the matches.
